Welcome to the <abbr title="Open Concept Lab">OCL</abbr> GitHub! OCL is a global community that maintains <abbr title="MPL-2.0">open-source<abbr> health terminology management tools used throughout the world.

[Join our open source community today!](https://openconceptlab.org/)
